it-tools.description: Locally hosted collection of handy online tools for developers and people working in IT (tools for cryptography, conversion, network, etc.). Based on the official docker image https://hub.docker.com/r/corentinth/it-tools/, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

80.description: it-tools UI WebUI port. Suggested default: 18088.
80.label: WebUI port
